title: #291 Be A Colleen
itunes:title: #291 Be A Colleen
description:
Nikki goes over why she is in Los Angeles for the time being. She gives her Love is Blind highlights and gets Andrew's takes. Anya recommended a show called Alone which Nikki is hooked on and wants to add a twist of the plot to. Nikki and Andrew agree that they want to look hot for their partner and be able to talk about their insecurities. You Heard It Here First, a large penis gets in the way of a job, the actress that always gets a pass with guys and how to talk to your teens about sex. They go over new joke premises they are working on and in the Final Thought Nikki talks about her latest epiphany. 

----------
